name: GreenWay Infrastructure s.r.o.
goal: Electromobility solutions: we are rapidly growing start-up company in Slovakia and Poland and we build the best and most complex charging stations network for electric vehicles in Central and Eastern Europe. Our mission to enable better mobility not dependent on fossil fuels.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Directive 2014/94 about the infrastructure for alternative fuels.
